topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
Reports indicate that the OKX wallet (formerly OKEx) remains connected to the Radiant Capital aggregator following an exploit.
Sources:
- https://t.me/okxofficial_id

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
The Qilin hacking group claims to have breached Farmacia San Pablo, a Mexican wholesale and retail pharmacy chain. The incident was reportedly observed on January 2, 2026, and is currently pending verification.
Sources:
- https://bsky.app/profile/hackmanac.com/post/3mbm4kqyikr25
